title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a single CLI or Docker run; includes REST API and Go library.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client for Ollama; pip install ollama, sync & async chat/generate/embed helpers.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client; npm install ollama, works in Node & browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama; drop-in LLM & embeddings wrappers.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension turning Ollama models into inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by the community; use Ollama models in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: LangChain, LlamaIndex, Docker Compose, GPU tweaks, etc.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official Modelfile library (Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.).

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin for chatting / generating code with Ollama inside the editor.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot wrapper around Ollama; supports group chats & inline queries.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app exposing Ollama as async chat/complete endpoints with SSE.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI that talks to local Ollama; supports model switching & history.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js REST proxy adding JWT auth & rate-limiting in front of Ollama.

title: ollama-rust-embeddings
summary: Rust helper crate focused on generating embeddings via Ollama with batched requests.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama models to Discord slash commands & threads.
